title: Drawing, "Brahms: Dresser", August 15, 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY; stamp in black ink below: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY/PHOTO, STOCK/ARTICLE/HEIGHT/LENGTH/WIDTH/PRICE, MATERIALS/IF USED FOR PUBLICATION CREDIT/WHEN THIS PHOTO HAS SERVED ITS PURPOSE/PLEASE RETURN
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8391/F.S./BRAHMS, F.H.S. (?)/8/19/35, 8/19, 1, PIANO; inscribed in graphite in stamp below: 8391/CHEST/8/15/35; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of dresser. Four stacked, horizontal drawers with two circular pulls at left and right of each drawer. Lines of drawers extend to sides for decoration. Dresser in stained maple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Brahms: Dresser", August 15, 1935.
August 15, 1935. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-1001.
